title: Stock Market Modeling and Forecasting
text: The tool uses the yfinance library to fetch historical stock market data, providing a comprehensive dataset for analysis and modeling. With this data, we can train models to predict closing prices. With a deep understanding of the data and its underlying dynamics, you can choose the right modeling approach for your needs. The tool provides a range of models, including ARIMA, SARIMA, FB Prophet and more.

title: Stock Market Modeling and Forecasting
section: What can you do with this app?
text:
What can you do with this app?
⇛ Predict closing prices : Use our tool to predict the closing prices of your favorite stocks based on historical data.
⇛ Explore stock market trends : Analyze historical stock market data to identify trends and patterns.

title: Stock Market Modeling and Forecasting
text:
Get started
To get started, simply select a stock ticker symbol from the dropdown menu, and our app will fetch the historical data and provide you with a dataset which you can download and use further for your analysis.
Also you can decompose the stock pattern and stationarize the data before you decide the best modelling option for the data.
